entry.title: Covid-19 tracker android app for India with live notification

link.title: Covid-19 tracker android app for India with live notification

entry.content:
Features

Overall summary

Time series analysis via graph plots

State wise numbers

District wise numbers

Download link

APK file

Just made this app. Any suggestions or feedback will be appreciated.

Check it out here: https://t.co/9ayRMRsNiO#coronavirusinindia #coronaupdatesindia pic.twitter.com/3bujxnyTWx

— Nabarun Sarkar (@nbrsr) April 10, 2020
